page.title: 08RELIGION
page.content: ST.MARGARETS'CHURCH WAS BUILT IN 1884.REVEREND JOHN GREENWAY IS VICAR OF LIDLINGTON AND RECTOR OF MARSTON MORETEYNE.SERVICES ARE ON ALTERNATIVE SUNDAYS,THESE ARE FAMILY SERVICES DURING WHICH THE CHILDREN LEAVE TO ATTEND SUNDAY SCHOOL REJOINING THE CONGREGATION FOR HOLY COMMUNION. MAIN CHURCH FESTIVALS ARE ALTERNATED APART FROM HARVEST FESTIVAL. ATTENDANCES ARE SMALL.ST. MARGARETS'HAS A PAROCHIAL CHURCH COUNCIL TWO OF WHICH ARE CHURCHWARDENS REPONSIBLE FOR THE ADMINISTRATION. THE METHODIST CHAPEL HOLDS A SUNDAY MORNING SERVICE,A SEPARATE SUNDAY SCHOOL AND A FAMILY SERVICE MONTHLY. THE CHAPEL IS ON A CURCUIT ATTENDED BY A SUPERINTENDANT MINISTER, ASSISTED BY LAY PREACHERS.ATTENDANCES ARE SMALL. OTHER DENOMINATIONS LIKE ROMAN CATHOLICS ATTEND CHURCHES OUTSIDE THE AREA.
